entries.title: Will Samsung's New Galaxy S23 Lineup Get You to Upgrade?
entries.description: Photography improvements are a priority for Samsung’s three new Galaxy S23 smartphones.

entries.title: FTC Loses Antitrust Challenge to Facebook Parent Meta
entries.description: A federal judge declined to halt Meta’s acquisition of the virtual-reality startup Within Unlimited, delivering a setback to antitrust enforcers at the Federal Trade Commission seeking to block the deal.

entries.title: Intel CEO Takes Pay Cut as Chip Maker Targets Cost Reductions
entries.description: Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger and other managers are taking pay cuts, days after the company’s quarterly earnings disappointed Wall Street and spurred a credit-rating downgrade.

entries.title: Peloton Narrows Losses as Sales Fall Less Than Forecast
entries.description: The maker of connected fitness equipment reported a 30% drop in quarterly sales, though it reduced the amount of cash being burned by its operations.

entries.title: EA Shows Why Mobile Games Are a Minefield
entries.description: ‘Apex Legends Mobile’ misfire drives videogame publisher to pull plug amid tough period

entries.title: Splunk to Cut About 325 Jobs, Scale Back Outsourcing
entries.description: The software company also said it would scale back the use of external agencies and consultants as it seeks to cut costs.

entries.title: Leaders of Self-Driving-Truck Company Face Espionage Concerns Over China Ties
entries.description: A national-security review sparked concerns over TuSimple executives’ alleged technology transfer to China.

entries.title: Meta Is Expected to Post Earnings Drop From Digital Ad Woes
entries.description: The Facebook and Instagram parent has been leaning more heavily on artificial intelligence to revive its fortunes.
